menuItems.name: Signature Blend
menuItems.description: Our house blend coffee with hints of chocolate and vanilla. Perfect for any time of day.

menuItems.description: Light roast coffee with bright, fruity notes and floral aroma from Ethiopian highlands.

menuItems.name: Espresso Romano
menuItems.description: Traditional Italian espresso with a twist of lemon peel for a unique citrus finish.

menuItems.name: Decaf Colombia
menuItems.description: Full-bodied decaffeinated coffee from Colombian mountains, smooth and rich.

menuItems.name: Premium Matcha Latte
menuItems.description: Ceremonial grade matcha powder with steamed milk and a touch of sweetness.

menuItems.name: Earl Grey Supreme
menuItems.description: Classic Earl Grey tea blend with bergamot oil and cornflower petals.

menuItems.name: Chamomile Honey
menuItems.description: Relaxing chamomile tea with pure wildflower honey and dried apple pieces.

menuItems.name: Butter Croissant
menuItems.description: Flaky, buttery croissant baked fresh daily with French technique and premium butter.

menuItems.name: Chocolate Danish
menuItems.description: Rich chocolate-filled Danish pastry with a crispy exterior and smooth chocolate center.

menuItems.name: Seasonal Fruit Tart
menuItems.description: Fresh seasonal fruits on vanilla custard base with a crispy pastry shell.

menuItems.name: Club Sandwich
menuItems.description: Triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread.

menuItems.name: Veggie Panini
menuItems.description: Grilled vegetables with mozzarella and pesto sauce pressed in artisan bread.

menuItems.name: Iced Vanilla Latte
menuItems.description: Cold espresso with milk and vanilla syrup served over ice with whipped cream.

menuItems.name: Fresh Orange Juice
menuItems.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice from premium oranges, no additives or preservatives.
